New Records: Elly De La Cruz joined Eric Davis and Barry Larkin as the only Reds players with 25 homers and 65 stolen bases in a season
Key Match Events: Elly De La Cruz hit a three-run homer in the fourth inning to make the score 6-0
Billy Cook hit a solo homer off Alan Busenitz in the ninth for Pittsburgh's run
Post-Match Reflections: Elly De La Cruz said "It means a lot to me, those are great players. I feel great. I wanted to finish strong."
Reds manager David Bell said "He made pitches when he needed to, which shows the maturity. He's prepared. He knows what he's doing."
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pirates rookie Jared Jones (6-8) tied season-highs with six earned runs and two homers allowed
Reds: LHP Sam Moll (left shoulder impingement) will not pitch this season
Reds: RHP Hunter Greene (9-4, 2.83) will come off the injured list to make his first start since Aug 13
